utsuhoReiuji:RarePower.NAME: Placeholder Power
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, TOUCH #b

utsuhoReiuji:SelfTokamakPower.NAME: Self Tokamak
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the next turn, gain #b

utsuhoReiuji:CreepingSunPower.NAME: Creeping Sun
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase the damage dealt by your next attack damage by
for each card you play until your next attack.

utsuhoReiuji:JupitersDescentPower.NAME: Jupiter's Descent
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, look at the top two cards of your deck. Play one and exhaust the other.
